channel.title: Dead server?
channel.description: First of all, I downloaded Minecraft but it says the server is outdated. Second, I heard that the server is dead, is this true? I enjoy Minecraft but there are no active servers that are online. If anyone has a suggestion, feel free to post.

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Essentials wasn’t updated yesterday, but it appears to be now, so maybe I can get it going tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:8, topic:397337”]It’s probably dead now, but only because we are running an older version. Bukkit just now released a recommended build that supports 1.6.6, so I will work on upgrading later today, if all the plugins work out then it can go live tonight.[/quote]How’s that going?

Read full topic

item.title: Dead server?

item.description:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:12, topic:397337”]I hope the server can go online soon :P.

Then we can go to the official nether >:D. and actually see when something is attacking us.[/quote]

the server is on its just not 1.6.6

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Maybe add some mods or something, make it some kinda Rp, etc? Some of the most popular servers on MC forums (with over 150 pages) are servers that involve rather intense RP, such as the post apocalyptic server (over 230 pages).

Read full topic

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

I’d like a creative server tbh, the problem I see is if people don’t have limitations on what they can build, it will get pretty crowded…

item.title: Dead server?

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

To be honest, its boring building and getting the resources. I play Single player much more just because I can use TooManyItems.

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s probably dead now, but only because we are running an older version. Bukkit just now released a recommended build that supports 1.6.6, so I will work on upgrading later today, if all the plugins work out then it can go live tonight.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead server?

item.description:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:6, topic:397337”]I’m actually doing a lets play with someone from the mcforums.net. We’re currently building the pre-determined areas so we can sail along with episodes.[/quote]link to channel?

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Davidi2:

When we have updates it takes us a while to rebound while people get the latest client. Also, it may just be me, but it seems like in general less people are into minecraft now…

Would make sence, as Minecraft hit a really ‘fad’ area quick. Only real people who still play are the few who actually enjoy the game as a whole, and not specific aspects.

Read full topic

When we have updates it takes us a while to rebound while people get the latest client. Also, it may just be me, but it seems like in general less people are into minecraft now…

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Mr Mopar X:

First of all, I downloaded Minecraft but it says the server is outdated. Second, I heard that the server is dead, is this true? I enjoy Minecraft but there are no active servers that are online. If anyone has a suggestion, feel free to post.

1> You can get the 1.5BIN file that was posted here
2> (from personal experience) One minute you can be online yourself, and the next 7 people. The amount of players is very jumpy.

Read full topic

item.title: Dead server?
item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

Once Bukkit becomes more stable, everyone will be able to play again with the latest version of Minecraft.
